short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Offline Realtime HTML Editor, for quick coding checking on the code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An offline real-tile HTML preview Chrome Application. 
Great for testing your code really quick without any need to be connected to the internet.
